welcome: Welcome to our Sea Tours Company
explore_new_destinations_and_experiences: Explore new destinations and experiences with our professional team.

paris.name: Paris
paris.desc: Experience the charm of Paris — the city of lights, art, and romance. Discover iconic landmarks, world-class cuisine, and vibrant culture.

tokyo.name: Tokyo
tokyo.desc: Dive into the fascinating blend of tradition and technology in Tokyo. Explore neon streets, ancient temples, and incredible cuisine.

cairo.name: Cairo
cairo.desc: Step back in time to the land of Pharaohs. Cairo offers timeless history, vibrant souks, and the majestic River Nile.

maldives.name: Maldives
maldives.desc: Escape to paradise. The Maldives offer white sand beaches, turquoise waters, and luxury resorts like no other.

flight.title: Flight Booking
flight.desc: Book flights to any destination with exclusive offers.

hotel.title: Hotel Reservations
hotel.desc: Find and book the best hotels at great prices.

tour.title: Tour Packages
tour.desc: Enjoy unforgettable tours across the world.

visa.title: Visa Assistance
visa.desc: We help you with all visa processing requirements.

vacation.title: Vacation Planning
vacation.desc: Create your dream holiday with our experts.

transport.title: Transportation
transport.desc: Reliable airport transfers and city rides.

cruise.title: Cruise Trips
cruise.desc: Luxury cruise experiences for all destinations.

events.title: Event Management
events.desc: We organize conferences, events, and meetings.

group.title: Group Travel
group.desc: Special packages for families and groups.

photography.title: Photography Tours
photography.desc: Capture your memories with professional photos.

offers.title: Special Offers
offers.desc: Exclusive deals and discounts all year round.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.desc: We are always available to assist you.

choose_your_next_destination: Choose your next destination with us
title: Ready to Discover Your Next Adventure?
description: Book your trip with us today and enjoy an unforgettable journey full of excitement and beauty.
footer_description: Discover the world with comfort and adventure. We help you find the perfect journey that suits your dreams.

about_.title: About Us
about_.subtitle: We create unforgettable travel experiences around the world.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: Our mission is to make travel simple, joyful, and personalized for every explorer.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.desc: Behind our success is a passionate team committed to delivering the best experiences.
team.name: Hamza Mohamed
